Question: However, this person's work was not known to European architects until the publication of the Wasmuth Portfolio.
Hints: This person also designed many of the interior elements of his buildings, such as the furniture and stained glass.
A lesser known project that never came to fruition was this person's plan for Emerald Bay, Lake Tahoe.
In An Autobiography, this person claimed that he was unaware that his side ventures were a breach of his contract.
